content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 21), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "ゲーム開始。敵空母は左上(3,3)近傍のランダム位置にいる。私の空母は(19,21)にいるので、敵空母までの距離は約20ヘクス程度。航空部隊の航続距離は22なので、ギリギリ届く可能性がある。まず敵空母の位置を特定するため、左上方向に索敵を行う必要がある。BSQ1を(3,3)付近に発艦させて索敵を開始する。同時に空母を北西方向に移動させて、より効果的な索敵範囲を確保する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 15, "y": 17}, "launch_target": {"x": 3, "y": 3}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=3 y=3 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=5 y=5.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航空部隊の航続距離22ヘクスの制限で(3,3)は届かない。現在位置(19,21)から距離22以内で敵空母がいる可能性が高い左上方向を索敵する必要がある。(5,5)なら距離約20で範囲内。まずBSQ1を(5,5)に発艦させて左上方向の索敵を開始し、空母も北西方向に移動して次のターンでより広範囲を索敵できるようにする。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 15, "y": 17}, "launch_target": {"x": 5, "y": 5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (5, 5) while at (19, 22).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 23), en route to target (15, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 22), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が(5,5)に向けて出撃中。空母は(15,17)に向けて移動中。敵空母は(3,3)近傍にいるはずなので、BSQ1が索敵範囲に入れば発見できる可能性がある。BSQ2も発艦させて別方向から索敵を行うべき。敵空母の可能性がある範囲を考慮して、BSQ2は少し東寄りの(7,3)付近を索敵させる。これで左上方向の広い範囲をカバーできる。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 3}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (7, 3) while at (19, 24).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 25), en route to target (15, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 18), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 24), outbound toward (7, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "両航空部隊が索敵に向かっている。BSQ1は(17,18)から(5,5)へ、BSQ2は(19,24)から(7,3)へ移動中。空母は(15,17)に向けて移動中。まだ敵空母は発見されていない。航空部隊が目標地点に到達するまで待機し、索敵結果を確認する必要がある。空母の移動は継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 16) while at (15, 14).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 16) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (18, 26), en route to target (15, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 14), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 20), outbound toward (7, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "重要な発見！BSQ1が敵航空部隊ASQ1を(13,16)で発見した。ASQ1は(11,16)から(13,16)に移動しているので東方向に移動中。これは敵空母から発艦した可能性が高い。敵航空部隊の移動方向から敵空母の位置を推定できる。ASQ1が東に移動しているということは、敵空母は西側、つまり左上方向にいる可能性が高い。BSQ1とBSQ2の索敵を継続し、敵空母の発見を急ぐ。空母の移動も継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (16, 16) while at (13, 11).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (10, 16) while at (15, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (17, 16) while at (15, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (13, 20) while at (15, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (10, 16) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (17, 16) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (13, 20) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 27), en route to target (15, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 10), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 16), outbound toward (10, 16), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "素晴らしい！BSQ2が敵空母AC1を(10,16)で発見し、攻撃目標に設定した。敵空母の位置が確定したので、これで勝利に大きく近づいた。BSQ2は敵空母への攻撃に向かっている。BSQ1は(5,5)への索敵を継続中だが、既に敵空母を発見したので、BSQ1も敵空母攻撃に参加させるべき。BSQ1の新たな目標を敵空母(10,16)に変更する。空母は安全な位置に移動させる必要がある。敵航空部隊ASQ1とASQ2が活動中なので、反撃を避けるため南東方向に移動する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 20, "y": 25}, "launch_target": {"x": 10, "y": 16}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "エラーを理解した。既に両航空部隊（BSQ1とBSQ2）は出撃中で、空母に搭載されている航空部隊はない。そのため新たな発艦指示は出せない。BSQ2は既に敵空母AC1への攻撃に向かっているので、これを継続させる。空母は敵航空部隊の反撃を避けるため、安全な位置に移動させる必要がある。敵航空部隊ASQ1が(17,16)、ASQ2が(13,20)にいるので、これらから離れた南東方向に移動する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 25, "y": 25}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (18, 16) while at (14, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (11, 17) while at (11, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (11, 16).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 17) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 16) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (15, 20) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (18, 27), en route to target (25, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (10, 8), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 16), engaging an enemy target at (11, 17), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ2が敵空母AC1と交戦中！敵空母は(11,17)に移動している。BSQ2が攻撃を開始したのは非常に良い状況。BSQ1はまだ(5,5)に向かっているが、敵空母が発見されたので、BSQ1も攻撃に参加させたい。しかし既に出撃中の航空部隊には新たな指示を出せない。空母は敵航空部隊の反撃を避けるため、安全な位置への移動を継続する。敵航空部隊ASQ1が(18,16)、ASQ2が(15,20)にいるので、これらから離れた位置に移動する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (11, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 18 damage while at (11, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (11, 16).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 26) while at (20, 27).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (11, 17) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 16) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 26) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (20, 27), en route to target (25, 25), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 6), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ2が敵空母AC1に18ダメージを与えて帰還中！敵空母のHPは72/100になった。しかしBSQ2のHPも22/40に減少している。危険なのは敵航空部隊ASQ2が(18,26)で私の空母に接近していること。私の空母は(20,27)にいるので非常に近い。ASQ2は攻撃に来ている可能性が高い。空母を緊急回避させる必要がある。南方向に移動して距離を取る。BSQ1はまだ(5,5)に向かっているが、敵空母は既に発見済みなので問題ない。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 22, "y": 30}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=22 y=30 out of map bounds. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=21 y=29.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "マップの境界を超えてしまった。マップは30x30なので、y=30は範囲外。敵航空部隊ASQ2が(18,26)で私の空母(20,27)に接近している。緊急回避が必要。南東方向の安全な位置に移動する。y=29が最大なので、(22,29)に移動する。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 22, "y": 29}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (21, 28) while at (22, 28).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (9, 17) while at (13, 19).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (5, 5).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (9, 17) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 16) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (21, 28) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 28), en route to target (22, 29), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (5, 5), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 19), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "危険な状況！敵航空部隊ASQ2が(21,28)で私の空母(22,28)のすぐ隣にいる。攻撃される可能性が非常に高い。緊急回避が必要。BSQ1とBSQ2は両方とも帰還中で、BSQ2は敵空母AC1が(9,17)に移動したことを報告している。敵空母は西に移動している。空母を東方向に移動させてASQ2から距離を取る必要がある。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 26, "y": 26}, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ2) while at (22, 28).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ2) causing 26 damage while at (22, 28).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (9, 17) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (18, 16) (previously at (11, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (21, 28) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (22, 28), en route to target (26, 26), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 23), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "空母が敵航空部隊ASQ2と交戦し、26ダメージを与えたが、自分も74/100にダメージを受けた。ASQ2のHPは24/40に減少。空母は(26,26)に向けて移動中。BSQ1とBSQ2は帰還中で、BSQ1は(7,9)、BSQ2は(15,23)にいる。敵空母AC1は(9,17)で72/100のHP。両航空部隊が帰還したら再度攻撃を仕掛ける必要がある。空母の移動を継続して安全を確保する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (20, 26) while at (23, 28).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (7, 15) while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 16) while at (9, 13).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (19, 24) while at (18, 25).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 15) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (12, 16) (previously at (12, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (19, 24) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (24, 28), en route to target (26, 26), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 25), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1を(7,15)で再発見した。敵空母は西に移動を続けている（HP72/100）。ASQ2は(19,24)で私の空母に向かって移動中のようだ。BSQ1とBSQ2は帰還中で、BSQ2は(18,25)にいるので間もなく帰艦する。空母は(24,28)で安全な位置に移動中。両航空部隊が帰艦したら、再度敵空母への攻撃を準備する必要がある。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (18, 22) while at (20, 26).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (7, 14) while at (11, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (8, 15) while at (11, 17).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 14) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (8, 15) (previously at (12, 16)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (18, 22) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (25, 27), en route to target (26, 26), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (11, 17), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 26), returning to the carrier, HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ1が敵空母AC1を(7,14)で継続追跡中。敵空母は南に移動している（HP72/100）。BSQ2は(22,26)で空母に接近中、間もなく帰艦する。BSQ1も(11,17)で帰還中。両航空部隊が帰艦したら、敵空母への第二波攻撃を準備する。敵航空部隊ASQ1は(8,15)、ASQ2は(18,22)にいる。空母は安全な位置(26,26)への移動を継続する。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 12 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) landed on the carrier while at (26, 26).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (13, 19) while at (15, 18).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 14) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (13, 19) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 26), en route to target (26, 26), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 18), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ2が帰艦完了！HP22/40だが再出撃可能。BSQ1はまだ帰還中で(15,18)にいる。敵空母AC1は(7,14)でHP72/100。BSQ2を即座に再出撃させて敵空母への第二波攻撃を行う。敵空母の最後の確認位置(7,14)に向けて発艦させる。BSQ1も間もなく帰艦するので、連続攻撃で敵空母を撃沈できる可能性が高い。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 14}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=7 y=14 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=9 y=16.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking": "航続距離22ヘクスの制限で(7,14)は届かない。現在空母は(26,26)にいるので、敵空母AC1の最後の確認位置(7,14)は距離が約24ヘクスで範囲外。敵空母がいる可能性が高い範囲内で攻撃可能な座標を選ぶ必要がある。(9,16)なら距離約22で範囲内。敵空母は西方向に移動しているので、この付近にいる可能性が高い。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": {"x": 9, "y": 16}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 13 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 18) while at (16, 20).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (9, 16) while at (25, 26).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 14) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 18) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (18, 20), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (25, 26), outbound toward (9, 16), HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ2が(9,16)に向けて出撃中。BSQ1は(18,20)で帰還中。敵空母AC1の最後の確認位置は(7,14)でHP72/100。BSQ2が目標地点に到達すれば敵空母を発見・攻撃できる可能性が高い。BSQ1も間もなく帰艦するので、連続攻撃の準備を整える。空母は安全な位置(26,26)で待機中。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 14 of 30.


Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (7, 14) (previously at (10, 16)), HP 72/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 18) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 26), en route to target (26, 26), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (20, 23), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (22, 24), outbound toward (9, 16), HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking": "BSQ2は(9,16)に向けて移動中で(22,24)にいる。BSQ1は(20,23)で帰還中。敵空母AC1は(7,14)でHP72/100、敵航空部隊ASQ2は(12,18)でHP24/40。BSQ2が目標地点に到達すれば敵空母を発見・攻撃できるはず。BSQ1も間もなく帰艦するので、第三波攻撃の準備を整える。現在は両航空部隊の行動を見守る段階。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 15 of 30.


Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 18) (previously at (11, 19)), HP 24/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (26, 26), en route to target (26, 26), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (24, 24), returning to the carrier, HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (19, 22), outbound toward (9, 16), HP 22/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
